SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT068
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message shows the user's current options for the Undelivered Message Report. It is the response to an MT 048 Undelivered Report Rules Request.
From: FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: holiday-suppression
SystemField.description:
Holiday suppression option, where:
a) Y = yes. Suppression during holiday
b) N = no. No suppression during holiday

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: holiday-suppression
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Holiday suppression option, where:
a) Y = yes. Suppression during holiday
b) N = no. No suppression during holiday

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Holiday Suppression Option '" + $value + "'. holiday-suppression value should be either Y or N."

SystemField.Name: generation-time-options
SystemField.description:
Generation option, where:
a) <hour> = fixed hour every day, in the range 00-23
b) CF = cut-off time for every country
c) RQ = on request only

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: generation-time-options
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Generation option, where:
a) <hour> = fixed hour every day, in the range 00-23
b) CF = cut-off time for every country
c) RQ = on request only

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Generation Option '" + $value + "'. generation-time-options value should be CF , RQ or in between 00 to 23."

SystemField.Name: reporting-options
SystemField.description:
Reporting Options, where:
a) RT = all undelivered at report time
b) nn = undelivered for more than nn hours (range: 00 < nn < 24)
c) VD = value-date-sensitive message undelivered after the Receiver's cut-off time on the value date.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: reporting-options
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Reporting Options, where:
a) RT = all undelivered at report time
b) nn = undelivered for more than nn hours (range: 00 < nn < 24)
c) VD = value-date-sensitive message undelivered after the Receiver's cut-off time on the value date.
